metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17942 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
In LibTIFF 4.0.9, there is a heap-based buffer over-read in the function PackBitsEncode in tif_packbits.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-17942` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.3.0-1
libtiff-tools - 4.3.0-1
libtiff5 - 4.3.0-1
libtiffxx5 - 4.3.0-1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> probably a dupe of CVE-2016-5319 as of 2021-02-24, no upstream fix ccdm94> this CVE is considered by upstream as a duplicate of CVE-2016-5319, as per information on issue 2767 of its bugzilla. This has been marked by upstream as "won't fix# since bmp2tiff has been removed from libtiff starting on version 4.0.7. Therefore, there is no patch available for versions 4.0.6 and earlier.

criterions.comment: tiff package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.0-1').
